description: Detects Malleable OneDrive Profile Author: Markus Neis. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: CobaltStrike Malleable OneDrive Browsing Traffic Profile
query: ((http.request.method:"GET" AND url.original:*?manifest\=wac AND (destination.domain:"onedrive.live.com" OR url.domain:"onedrive.live.com")) AND (NOT (url.original:http* AND url.original:*\:\/\/onedrive.live.com\/*)))
